duties_responsibilities.duty: Cast a compelling vision for how the company sells to and collaborates with a diverse ecosystem of wholesale customers.
Build creative and well-reasoned go-to-market strategies and deliver on them.
Design, lead, and care for the sales team, shaping a way of working that inspires them and enables them to do their best work.
Communicate with skill and intentionality, across all levels of the organization and with customers of all types.
Balance a wide range of stakeholder interests and champion the needs of wholesale customers and the sales organization.
Identify, make the case for, and marshal the necessary resources to enable the team’s success.
Craft a vision for understanding a complex business with data and implementing a concrete data ecosystem.
Think in systems and frameworks; at scale; considering multiple time horizons.
Provide senior sales gravitas and astuteness to navigate and close tough deals.
Be part of the leadership team steering the company through major organizational decisions and milestones.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
